definition: pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The hypothalamus controls hormone secretions from the nearby pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 下丘腦控制附近腦下垂體分泌激素。

sentences.english: Deep blue stimulates the pituitary gland, which then regulates our sleep patterns.
sentences.chinese: 深藍色會刺激腦下垂體，然後調節人們的睡眠模式。

sentences.english: He had acromegaly, a disease caused by a tumor in the pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 他患有先端肥大症，這是由腦下垂體的腫瘤引起的。

sentences.english: With KIMI, you can reactivate your pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 基米，你可以重新啓動您的腦下垂體。

sentences.english: It is often associated with pituitary gigantism.
sentences.chinese: 常伴發腦下垂體巨人症。
